name: Black Knight

skills.name: Smash
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on this Champion for 1 turn if the attack is critical.

effects.notes: Single target. Places Continuous Heal (self) on crit.

skills.name: Foul Play
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: AoE. 50% chance to place Decrease ATK.

skills.name: Valor
skills.description: Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff and a [Continuous Heal] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Places an [Unkillable] buff on this Champion for 1 turn.

effects.notes: Places 60% Increase DEF on all allies for 2 turns.
Places Continuous Heal (15%) on all allies for 2 turns.
Places Unkillable on self for 1 turn.

skills.name: Steadfast
skills.description: Heals this Champion by 15% of their MAX HP and places an [Unkillable] buff on them for 1 turn when hit with a fatal hit.

effects.notes: Heals self by 15% MAX HP when hit with a fatal hit.
Places Unkillable on self for 1 turn when hit with a fatal hit.

skills.notes: Self-sustain and Unkillable on fatal hit.

general: PRIORITY OFFENSE T6: WARMASTER (A1 'Smash' and A2 'Foul Play' are single-hit attacks - 60% proc per skill for 4% boss MAX HP / 6% dungeon boss MAX HP damage). Giant Slayer is INCORRECT for Black Knight (no multi-hit skills).

PRIORITY DEFENSE T6: Delay Death (CRITICAL - synergizes with passive 'Steadfast' which triggers Unkillable on fatal hit). Unshakeable (CRITICAL +50 RES for tank role - base 50 RES = 100 total with mastery, excellent for Arena/Doom Tower/Faction Wars).
PRIORITY SUPPORT T6: Lasting Gifts (CRITICAL - extends A3 buffs from 2→3 turns: Increase DEF 60% + Continuous Heal on all allies, self Unkillable 1 turn).

KEY MASTERIES: Warmaster (A1/A2 single-hit), Delay Death + Unshakeable (tank role synergy), Lasting Gifts (A3 buff extension), Lay on Hands + Healing Savior (healing boost for A1 Continuous Heal on crit + A3 Continuous Heal on all allies), Shadow Heal (healing synergy with passive heal on fatal hit).

SYNERGIES: Passive 'Steadfast' triggers on fatal hit - heals self 15% MAX HP + places Unkillable for 1 turn (synergizes with Delay Death mastery for tanking). A1 places Continuous Heal on self if crit (build 100% C.RATE for sustain). A3 places Increase DEF 60% + Continuous Heal on all allies + self Unkillable (Lasting Gifts extends 2→3 turns). A2 places Dec ATK 50% on enemies (50% chance base, 70% booked). Build for HP% (large MAX HP pool for passive heal), DEF% (synergizes with A3 Increase DEF), 100% C.RATE (A1 self-heal), RES (Unshakeable +50 for 100 total).

UNIQUE MECHANICS: Passive grants Unkillable on fatal hit (once per proc, must wait for buff to expire before it can trigger again). Makes Black Knight an excellent tank for high-damage bosses (Doom Tower, Faction Wars, Arena). Base 50 RES is above average - Unshakeable mastery brings to 100 RES for strong debuff resistance.

BANNER LORDS FACTION WARS: Top-tier tank/support (10/10 rating). User has completed Banner Lords Normal - excellent for Hard progression. Provides team DEF buff, healing, and Dec ATK debuff while tanking with passive Unkillable.
CHEESE POTENTIAL: Unkillable passive can be used for boss strategies where Black Knight tanks fatal hits while team deals damage. Not a traditional cheese but enables unique tank strategies.

mechanics_advisory: Black Knight is a top-tier tank/support (Dungeons 9/10, Doom Tower 9/10, Arena 9/10, Faction Wars 10/10, Clan Boss 7/10). A1/A2 are single-hit attacks that benefit from Warmaster (60% proc, 4% boss MAX HP). KEY STRENGTHS: (1) Passive 'Steadfast' triggers on fatal hit - heals self 15% MAX HP + places Unkillable for 1 turn (synergizes with Delay Death mastery for extreme tanking), (2) A3 'Valor' places Increase DEF 60% + Continuous Heal on all allies for 2 turns + self Unkillable for 1 turn (4-turn CD booked - Lasting Gifts extends buffs 2→3 turns for near-permanent uptime), (3) A2 places Dec ATK 50% on all enemies (50% base, 70% booked - 3-turn CD), (4) A1 places Continuous Heal on self if crit (build 100% C.RATE for sustain). Base 50 RES (above average) + Unshakeable mastery = 100 RES for strong debuff resistance. Build for HP% (large MAX HP pool for passive heal + tanking), DEF% (synergizes with A3 Increase DEF), 100% C.RATE (A1 self-heal), RES (Unshakeable for 100 total). MASTERIES: Warmaster (single-hit skills), Delay Death (CRITICAL - passive Unkillable synergy), Unshakeable (CRITICAL +50 RES for tank), Lasting Gifts (CRITICAL - A3 buff extension 2→3 turns), Lay on Hands + Healing Savior + Shadow Heal (healing boost). User's Banner Lords Faction Wars COMPLETE (Normal) - excellent for Hard progression as top-tier tank/support (10/10 rating). Strong for Arena tank teams, Doom Tower boss tanking, and dungeon wave/boss survivability.
